title: Please Can Anybody identify the Font !
content:
Good Morning,  
That's my first post; Please apologize if there is a mistake on my side.  
below are the images of the font I am after.

Would really appreciate the effort if someone can identify the font.

Thanks.

Regards,  
Hash

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420061543im_/http:/typophile.com/files/test11_5198.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420061543im_/http:/typophile.com/files/test12_6499.jpg)
author: hasnain125

comments.content: Thanks for your reply but there is huge difference between the capital J and k in the cursive writing.
Mandate Font is though 99% same /// Thanks you very Much Renko

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420061543im_/http:/typophile.com/files/freehand521_5318.png)

Don’t see the »huge« difference, but you are welcome anyway ;)
